user.title: YouTube Current Watching Setup
user.description:
YouTube cookies file is required.

How to export cookies:
1. Install Chrome extension 'Get cookies.txt LOCALLY'
2. Allow the extension to run in incognito mode
3. Visit YouTube.com and make sure you're logged in
4. Click the extension icon and select 'Export All Cookies'
5. Rename the downloaded file to youtube_cookies.txt
6. Upload to Home Assistant's /config folder
